Package GOFO.System

Class GoFo

java.lang.Object
GOFO.System.GoFo
public class GoFo
extends java.lang.Object
Gofo: Stores the Users, playgrounds, and the bookings details

In charge with functions that deals with the database.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Ntajugumba Guy Cherubin 20160379

    • getPlaygrounds

      public static java.util.ArrayList<Playground> getPlaygrounds​(java.lang.String playgroundOwnerID)
      Returns the playgrounds of an owner if given playgroundOwnerID

      Or returns all playgrounds if given empty string.

      Parameters:
      playgroundOwnerID - playground owner id or empty String.
      Returns:
      playgrounds if found otherwise empty ArrayList.
